explanation: [0-0] A crystal-clear creek with sunlight penetrating the water surface and illuminating the cobblestones at the bottom, displaying shades of reddish-brown and grayish-black.

[0-6] A hand wearing a transparent glove appears from the right side, moving a larger grayish-black cobblestone to the right, causing ripples in the water. The cobblestones and some aquatic plants on the creek bed become visible. The hand picks up a crystal-clear glass stone from the water, oval-shaped with a smooth surface, emitting a faint purple and golden luster.
